name: Tight Ride
description:
Two years ago the world was overrun by a strange crystalline anomaly known as the Crystal Plague.
Now you have to protect yourself and fight back against this new threat everyday.
Oh well…

With a mix of both classic and new survivors-like tropes, Tight Ride offers a different view on action rogue-lites:

  • Ride an amazing vehicle that never slows down in a post-apocalyptic survival fantasy
  • Play as a group of characters, each one having a unique arsenal and a set of perks
  • Use different combinations of auto-aiming weapons (and their evolutions!) to your advantage
  • Face multiple enemy types, each requiring different approach
  • Experiment with dozens of different perks and upgrades
  • Overcome challenges through your own skill and luck, not meta-progression and power creep
